citeinfo.origin: Jim Sparks, Geographic Information Officer, Indiana Office of Technology
Arnon Tsairi, GIS Analyst, 39 Degrees North, LLC
citeinfo.title: BROADBAND_COVERAGE_WIRELINE_WIRELESS_IN: Broadband Wireless Coverage and Wireline Coverage in Indiana (Indiana Utility Regulatory Commission and Service Providers, Polygon Featureclass)
citeinfo.othercit:
This data set was originally provided to personnel of the Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) by Indiana Office of Technology. The data were provided in an ESRI geodatabase format, and as two polygon feature classes named "BROADBAND_WIRELESS_20100712_IN" and "BROADBAND_WIRELINE_20100712_IN."
On June 16, 2011, personnel of 39 Degrees North supplied IGS personnel with an update to these data, named "BROADBAND_WIRELESS_20110401_IN" and "BROADBAND_WIRELINE_20110401_IN."
On May 23, 2013, personnel of 39 Degrees North supplied IGS personnel with an update (current as of May 14, 2013) to these data, named "BROADBAND_INDIANAMAP_UPDATE_SPRING2013.GDB." It should be noted that this update now combines coverage areas for wireless and wireline areas into one polygon feature class.
On November 13, 2013, personnel of 39 Degrees North supplied IGS personnel with an update (current as of October 22, 2013) to these data, named "BROADBAND_FALL_UPDATE_2013.GDB." It should be noted that this update continues to combine coverage areas for wireless and wireline areas into one polygon feature class.
citeinfo.onlink: Not available for download (viewable here - http://maps.indiana.edu/ )

descript.abstract: BROADBAND_COVERAGE_WIRELINE_WIRELESS_IN is a polygon feature class that contains broadband WIRELESS and WIRELINE coverage areas in Indiana, and was provided by personnel of the Indiana Office of Technology (IOT) and 39 Degrees North. The term "WIRELESS" includes the following techologies: Terrestrial Fixed Wireless - Unlicensed, Terrestrial Fixed Wireless - Licensed, and Terrestrial Mobile Wireless. The term "WIRELINE" includes the following techologies: AxDSL, DSL, Cable, and Fiber. The data set provided by IOT was in an ESRI geodatabase format and was named "BROADBAND_INDIANAMAP_UPDATE_SPRING2013.GDB."
descript.purpose: This data set was developed to delineate broadband wireless (Terrestrial Fixed Wireless - Unlicensed, Terrestrial Fixed Wireless - Licensed, and Terrestrial Mobile Wireless) and wireline (AxDSL, DSL, Cable, and Fiber) coverages areas in Indiana.
descript.supplinf: This dataset was created from multiple sources, primarily the Indiana Utility Regulatory Commission (IURC) and broadband service providers operating in Indiana.

timeperd.current: Based on metadata provided by IOT

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Office of Technology, Geographic Information Officer

cntaddr.address: 100 North Senate Avenue, IGCN Rm N551

idinfo.native: ESRI ArcGIS version 10.2, Service Pack 2 (Build 3200) geodatabase format

attracc.attraccr: This data set was provided by IOT personnel and is assumed to be accurate.

dataqual.complete:
This data set was provided by IOT personnel and is assumed to be complete.
The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by IOT:
"Approximately 31,000 square miles of Indiana has wireline and wireless data from either the IURC or service providers in this data set."

horizpa.horizpar:
The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by IOT:
"This data set was created from data provided by the IURC and service providers and joined to census blocks."

citeinfo.origin: IOT, Geographic Information Officer; Jim Sparks
citeinfo.title: BROADBAND_FALL_UPDATE_2013.GDB

srctime.srccurr: Based on metadata provided by IOT.

srcinfo.srccontr: Broadband wireless and wireline coverage areas in Indiana

procstep.procdesc: 39 Degrees North LLC received IURC data in shapefile format and service provider data in Excel format (which was joined to the census block layer). The IURC and service provider data were merged together to create a single dataset at the census block level. The boundaries in this dataset were dissolved to create a single polygon to deliniate the coverage area. All attribute fields were deleted and provided to IOT. Attribute fields will be included in future deliveries.

IGS personnel received an ESRI geodatabase named "BROADBAND_INDIANAMAP_UPDATE_SPRING2013.GDB" from personnel of 39 Degrees North LLC on May 23, 2013 (data are current as of May 14, 2013). The data was reprojected from WGS 1984 coordinate system to Universal Transverse Mercator (UTM), Zone 16, NAD83 using ESRI ArcCatalog. It was then exported to an ESRI shapefile format and renamed as BROADBAND_COVERAGE_WIRELINE_WIRELESS_IN.SHP to conform to internal naming conventions of the IGS.

IGS personnel received an ESRI geodatabase named "BROADBAND_FALL_UPDATE_2013.GDB" from personnel of 39 Degrees North LLC on November 13, 2013 (data are current as of October 22, 2013). The data was reprojected from WGS 1984 coordinate system to Universal Transverse Mercator (UTM), Zone 16, NAD83 using ESRI ArcCatalog. It was then exported to an ESRI shapefile format and renamed as BROADBAND_COVERAGE_WIRELINE_WIRELESS_IN.SHP to conform to internal naming conventions of the IGS.

This metadata file was pre-parsed and parsed using CNS (Chew and Spit, v. 2.6.1) and MP (Metadata Parser, v. 2.7.1) software written by Peter N. Schweitzer (U.S. Geological Survey). The errors generated by MP were all addressed and corrected, except that no values were assigned to "Abscissa_Resolution" and "Ordinate_Resolution."

distinfo.resdesc: Data available for viewing on IndianaMap
distinfo.distliab:
CREDIT
It is requested that the Indiana Office of Technology (IOT), Indiana Utility Regulatory Commission (IURC), and 39 Degrees North, LLC be cited in any products generated from this data. The following source citation should be included: [BROADBAND_COVERAGE_WIRELINE_WIRELESS_IN: Broadband Wireless Coverage and Wireline Coverage in Indiana (Indiana Utility Regulatory Commission and Service Providers, Polygon Featureclass)].
WARRANTY
Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey warrants that the media on which this product is stored will be free from defect in materials and workmanship for ninety (90) days from the date of acquisition. If such a defect is found, return the media to Publication Sales, Indiana Geological Survey, 611 North Walnut Grove, Bloomington, Indiana 47405-2208, and it will be replaced free of charge.
LIMITATION OF WARRANTIES AND LIABILITY
Except for the expressed warranty above, the product is provided "AS IS", without any other warranties or conditions, expressed or implied, including, but not limited to, warranties for product quality, or suitability to a particular purpose or use. The risk or liability resulting from the use of this product is assumed by the user. Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey shares no liability with product users indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages whatsoever, including, but not limited to, loss of revenue or profit, lost or damaged data or other commercial or economic loss. Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey is not responsible for claims by a third party. The maximum aggregate liability to the original purchaser shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the product.

metainfo.metuc: This metadata file is intended to accompany the data set identified and received from the IGS. It should not to be altered or summarized. IGS does not support secondary distribution. If this data set was received from anyone besides the IGS, this metadata file and the data set it describes may lack integrity.
